name: Breed (itch) (CharlieD_Dev)
description:
Made in 2 hours for the 6 hour Trijam, because I am terrible with time management.

Made in my own java game engine

How To Play:

Click the button to start

Select which two creatures you would like to breed, it will create a creature similar to both its parents

Select a fighter, it will fight the current enemy (stats in the upper left)

See How Long You Can Last, And Have Fun :)
